txt_en: Never walk away from failure. On the contrary, study it carefully and imaginatively for its hidden assets.
txt_cn: 遇到失败绝不要一走了之，相反的，为其隐藏的资产仔细并有想像力的研究。

txt_en: There’s never any guarantee that anyone will like you. So if anyone likes you at all, you’ve already won.
txt_cn: 永远无法保证有人会喜欢你。 所以如果有人喜欢你，你就已经赢了。

txt_en: If you’re offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.
txt_cn: 如果有人想提供一个绝佳的成长机会给你，千万别再问对方有哪些机会选择，先把握住就对了。

txt_en: Eloquent speech is not from lip to ear, but rather from heart to heart.
txt_cn: 在有说服力的演讲，讯息的传递不是由口到耳，而是由心到心。

txt_en: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
txt_cn: 越努力就能越幸运。

txt_en: If you're going through hell, keep going.
txt_cn: 如果你正在经历困境苦难的途中，请继续前进。

txt_en: Cherish forever what makes you unique, cuz you’re really a yawn if it goes.
txt_cn: 感恩让能你与众不同的一切，因为失去这些差异你将会过的索然无味。

txt_en: Nothing is impossible; the word itself says 'I'm possible!
txt_cn: 没有什么是不可能的 ; 这个词本意就是“我有一切可能” 。

txt_en: Whatever you are, be a good one.
txt_cn: 无论你是谁，请当好的那一位。

txt_en: The road to Easy Street goes through the sewer.
txt_cn: 前往「康庄大道」的路途中，你得先经历过下水道。

txt_en: Life is short, and it’s up to you to make it sweet.
txt_cn: 生命短暂，而你可以决定让它活出灿烂。

txt_en: Either run the day or the day runs you.
txt_cn: 成功的人主宰时间，失败的人被时间主宰。

txt_en: There’s so much creativity in brokeness. Brokeness will have you making it work.
txt_cn: 跳脱常规激发更多的创造力，同时可以造就不凡的成功。

txt_en: If they don’t give you a seat at the table, bring a folding chair
txt_cn: 即使没人给你上桌的机会，你依旧得想尽办法让自己参与其中。

txt_en: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
txt_cn: 我将成功归功于这一点：从不给或找任何借口。

txt_en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
txt_cn: 你人生的高度取决于你的态度非你的能力。

txt_en: Quality performance starts with a positive attitude.
txt_cn: 优质的表现始于积极的态度。

txt_en: A life lived by choice is a life of conscious action. A life lived by chance is a life of unconscious reaction.
txt_cn: 选择生活的人是有意识地行动的人。凭运气生活的人是无意识地反应的人。

txt_en: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
txt_cn: 生命是走向凋零还是兴盛与一个人的勇气成正比。

txt_en: A man, as a general rule, owes very little to what he is born with – a man is what he makes of himself.
txt_cn: 人一般而言，天生的能力对他影响不大， 他如何造就自己决定他的人生。

txt_en: Knowing is not enough; we must apply.
txt_cn: 光是知道是不够的; 我们必须能够应用。

txt_en: Wishing is not enough; we must do.
txt_cn: 光是许愿望是不够的; 我们必须行动。
